docs.snippet: THREE foreign leaders in humanity's struggle for political freedom have been chosen by Postmaster General Arthur E. Summerfield for honoring, each with a two-denomination set, in the "Champions of Liberty" stamp series which President Eisenhower...
docs.lead_paragraph: THREE foreign leaders in humanity's struggle for political freedom have been chosen by Postmaster General Arthur E. Summerfield for honoring, each with a two-denomination set, in the "Champions of Liberty" stamp series which President Eisenhower inaugurated last year. Mr. Summerfield yesterday fixed dates, names and other details as follows:

headline.main: NEWS OF THE WORLD OF STAMPS; Saluting 'El Libertador' And Other Heroes -- Malta Issue

docs.snippet: The New York Philharmonic's spring tour of Latin America has been extended from four to eight weeks to satisfy the demand for appearances by the orchestra.
docs.lead_paragraph: The New York Philharmonic's spring tour of Latin America has been extended from four to eight weeks to satisfy the demand for appearances by the orchestra.

headline.main: Philharmonic's Tour of Latin America Extended to 8 Weeks and 44 Concerts

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Feb. 22 (UP) -- The Government of Puerto Rico has offered to pay all expenses for ten talented young musicians to the three-week Casals Music FestivaI in San Juan this spring.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Feb. 22 (UP) -- The Government of Puerto Rico has offered to pay all expenses for ten talented young musicians to the three-week Casals Music FestivaI in San Juan this spring.
docs.abstract: Casals, Pablo (San Juan, PR): Govt to be host to 10 musicians under age of 25 from US and Latin Amer

headline.main: YOUNG MUSICIANS INVITED TO FETE; Puerto Rico Will Be Host to 10 Americans at Casals Programs This Spring

docs.snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO -- Brazil is currently offering the best tourist dollar bargains, while almost everywhere else in South America prices are rising appreciably without the compensation of favorable exchange rates.
docs.lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO -- Brazil is currently offering the best tourist dollar bargains, while almost everywhere else in South America prices are rising appreciably without the compensation of favorable exchange rates.
